summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Meridian Avenue from north Fortieth Street to North Fortieth Street et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks under Ordinance No. 16878, creating Local Improvement District No. 1586 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
